Package address

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
address.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Menu class currently only has static methods to prompt to standard output information about a Contact like name, etc.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected static Scanner
    userInput
    userInput is the object used to get the user input as Strings

      public String load()
      load fills AddressEntry objects from a file
      Returns:
      The file name as a String for the readFromFile method

    • add

      public AddressEntry add()
      add prompts the user for the required fields to fill an AddressEntry object
      Returns:
      The new AddressEntry object to add to the AddressBook

    • remove

      public String remove()
      remove deletes a contact from the list
      Returns:
      The last name as a String to search and delete on user request

    • find

      public String find()
      find prompts the user for the last name to search the list
      Returns:
      The String that the user inputted as the query to search
